tagline.title: BALI RAFTING AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS THE PERFECT CHOICES FOR THOSE WANT TO ENJOY THE WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND DO THE SPA TREATMANTS IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.text: BALI RAFTING AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS THE PERFECT CHOICES FOR THOSE WANT TO ENJOY THE WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND DO THE SPA TREATMANTS IN BALI ISLANDS
tagline.html: BALI RAFTING AND SPA TOUR PACKAGES IS THE PERFECT CHOICES FOR THOSE WANT TO ENJOY THE WHITE WATER RAFTING AT AYUNG RIVER AND DO THE SPA TREATMANTS IN BALI ISLANDS

description.text: Bali Rafting and Spa Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages joy and will make your holiday more memorable one, by give you opportunity to try the challenge rapids at Ayung river and then continue for having Spa treatments packages in Bali islands. This is the best choices of combo adventure packages, Firstly you will enjoy ride the floating tube to test the rapids challenge of Ayung River, the professional River Rafting Guide will give some short briefing about the safety and how to paddle in the river. During the rafting the rafting guide will stop the boat and give you change to swim at the river and see the fascinating small waterfall at the river. After finish the rafting you will escorted back to the finish point for enjoy the delicious lunch buffet with Indonesian food and then after finish lunch our professional Bali Tour Driver will driver you to the Spa provider to enjoy the 2 hours spa treatments, the spa treatments we offer consist of 1 hours Balinese massage and 1 hours spa treatments. The Spa treatments will make your mind and body refresh and feel like newborn after do the exhausting activity. This Bali Rafting and Spa Tour packages will make your day impressive along with our friendly Bali Tour Driver and comfortable car.

This Bali Rafting and Spa Tour packages will make your day impressive along with our friendly Bali Tour Driver and comfortable car.

title.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour | Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Ayung River Rafting Tour is one of white water rafting adventure tour packages we have to enjoy the great challenge of rapids adventure at Ayung River in northern of Ubud village. This river offer amazing experience for your journey to explore the river with amazing panorama view. This river is very suitable for beginner who never try the rafting before but want to try the challenge. During the rafting you will stop at the small waterfall at the river and allowed you to swim at the river. Is an rare experience you will have and the professional rafting guide will always give his maksimun services to make you more enjoyable.

title.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Spa Packages | Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Spa Tour Packages we offer is the best spa treatmants to make your day like new again, The treatmants with professional theraphist which already known the best spot and strong pressure to make your body and mind refresh. The 2 hours spa tour pacakges we offer consist of 1 hours balinese massage and 1 hours spa treatmants. The Balinese believe that the body, mind and spirit work in harmony. The health and well being of all make the whole happy. Enjoy this delightful blend of massage techniques: traditional Balinese massage, reflexology, face and hand massage.

price.title: Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 1,000,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 800,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 700,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 650,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 600,000/person

Note :

  • Get Special price for group booking

Bali Rafting and Spa Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comfortable and Good A/C condition
  • English Speaking Driver
  • Petrol
  • Mineral Water
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Rafting at Ayung River (2 Hours)
  • 2 Hours Spa packages (1 hours balinese massage + 1 hours spa)
  • Professional Rafting and Spa Therapist
  • Lunch buffet Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

content.event: Enjoy Rafting Adventure at Ayung River
Lunch finish and continue the tour
Spa Packages finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
